snippet: Despite the flurry of sales activity, the median sales price of $855,000 was up just slightly from the same quarter of 2012, according to a report to be released on Friday.
abstract: Manhattan real estate market continues its yearlong trend, ending final quarter of 2013 with scarcity of listings and surging sales, while prices remain relatively flat; median sales price, despite flurry of activity, is at $855,000, up just slightly from same quarter of 2012.
lead_paragraph: Despite the flurry of sales activity, the median sales price of $855,000 was up just slightly from the same quarter of 2012, according to a report to be released on Friday.

headline.main: Manhattan Real Estate Market Surging at Year’s End
headline.print_headline: Manhattan Real Estate Market Surging at Year’s End
